segments.text: Yes . I'd like to look at lipstick and eye shadow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What color set do you prefer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a beautiful selection of eye shadows this fall . Look at the colors . Aren't they beautiful ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But they're purple . I prefer a brown set .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you insist , I can show you the brown sets . I'll have to warn you that they're very ordinary , though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'm not so sure . Most of my make-up is brown .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you wear purple eye shadow for a change ? We also have lipstick to go with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Are you wearing any make-up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have a seat , please . Now , here is the mirror . How do you like it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not bad . Actually , it makes me look younger . I like it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Try the lipstick as well . See , how fresh and charming you look .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're right . I'll take them all .
segments.speaker: S2
